byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and KEVIN ROOSE

abstract: Lazard reported that revenue from advising on mergers and acquisitions increased by 24 percent, and Evercore said its investment banking revenue rose 38 percent.
snippet: Lazard reported that revenue from advising on mergers and acquisitions increased by 24 percent, and Evercore said its investment banking revenue rose 38 percent.

headline.main: Lazard and Evercore Log Gains Despite a Slowdown in Deals
headline.print_headline: Lazard and Evercore Log Gains Despite a Slowdown in Deals
